querys: SELECT TITULO, DESCRIPCION FROM CONFIG_ACCIONES_TBL WHERE ID_ACCION IN (SELECT ID_ACCION FROM CONFIG_MENU_ACCIONES_TBL WHERE UID_MENU IN (SELECT UID_MENU FROM CONFIG_MENU_TBL WHERE APLICACION='JPOS'))

SELECT DISTINCT DESOPERACION FROM CONFIG_ACCIONES_OPERACIONE_TBL WHERE ID_ACCION IN (SELECT ID_ACCION FROM CONFIG_MENU_ACCIONES_TBL WHERE UID_MENU IN (SELECT UID_MENU FROM CONFIG_MENU_TBL WHERE APLICACION='JPOS'))
SELECT DISTINCT VALOR FROM D_VARIABLES_TBL WHERE ID_VARIABLE LIKE '%TITULO%' AND VALOR IS NOT NULL
SELECT MENU FROM CONFIG_MENU_TBL WHERE APLICACION='JPOS'

SELECT SUBSTR(OPCION, 1, INSTR(OPCION, '\')-1) AS LEVEL1, SUBSTR(OPCION, INSTR(OPCION, '\', -1)+1) AS LEVEL2 FROM CONFIG_MENU_ACCIONES_TBL WHERE UID_MENU IN (SELECT UID_MENU FROM CONFIG_MENU_TBL WHERE APLICACION='JPOS')
